sections.description: CSS Variables manager for Gutenberg and Customizer. Easily manage and customize your WordPress site's appearance through CSS variables.
sections.changelog:
1.0.7

  • Added licensing system integration
  • Improved variable management
  • Enhanced compatibility with latest WordPress version
sections.frequently asked questions:
How do I manage my CSS variables?

Access the CSS Variables manager through the WordPress Customizer or Gutenberg editor.
